column5: It’s not that I think my mom wouldn’t care. It’s just that I think, wait know that she’d try to ignore it. I’ve tried opening up to her before but instead of trying to help me she started rambling about how I made her feel like a bad parent and she felt like a bad mother as she didn’t ‘raise me right’ which means I end up comforting her instead. I did got to my school too, 2 years ago. I wrote a letter and gave it to the councillor. He came back to me and said ‘I think you should talk to someone’ ignoring the fact that I wanted help from him. It was his job.
